title: Microsoft Warns Misconfigured Email Routing Can Enable Internal Domain Phishing
description: Threat actors engaging in phishing attacks are exploiting routing scenarios and misconfigured spoof protections to impersonate organizations' domains and distribute emails that appear as if they have been sent internally.
